title: Muon Space tapped by Air Force for cloud characterization from space
summary: The startup Muon Space announced Jan. 9 it will explore the use of climate-monitoring satellites to capture cloud characterization data for the U.S. Air Force.

title: China launches “lobster eye” Einstein Probe to unveil mysteries of X-ray universe
summary: China launched its Einstein Probe early Tuesday to detect X-ray emissions from violent, fleeting cosmic phenomena using novel lobster eye-inspired optics.

title: Space Development Agency confirms Rocket Lab will produce 18 satellites for U.S. military network
summary: The Space Development Agency confirmed on Jan. 8 that it awarded Rocket Lab a $515 million contract to build and operate 18 spacecraft that will be part of a low Earth orbit network of military satellites.

title: JPL lays off 100 contractors, citing budget uncertainty
summary: JPL laid off 100 contractors last week because of potential sharp budget cuts to Mars Sample Return (MSR) and warned that more layoffs could come.

title: U.S. Army issues new guidance on the use of space for ground warfare
summary: The U.S. Army's top leadership has unveiled new guidance underscoring the vital role of space systems in modern ground warfare and calling for greater investment in space capabilities.
